snippet.title: Neverdaunt:8Bit - Beta Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Neverdaunt:8Bit is a Massively Multiplayer Sandbox where you can build, invent and adventure. N8* is still in beta, but hugely improved and needed a brand new trailer to show off all the awesome new features. Must importaintly, N8* is now filled with Tronics! An in-game visual programing system, where you can build circuits to do amazing things.
Sign up, download the client and come play at: http://8bit.neverdaunt.com

Trailer background music: "Jump up and Bounce Down" by Fantomenk
http://www.youtube.com/user/FantomenK
